result.reason: QuickConnect hardcodes panel to Language.General instead of using the currently active panel, preventing proper multi-panel workflow
result.approach: In ConnectionsService.cs line 115 and WebHelper.cs line 21, replace hardcoded Language.General panel assignment with logic to detect the currently active ConnectionWindow panel name. QuickConnectToolStrip may need to pass the active panel context to the connection creation flow.
